allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d telegram_billing -c "INSERT INTO tariffs (id, slug, name, price, tokens, subscription_days, period_unit, period_value, subscription_fee, min_payment, is_active, sort_order) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), ''trial-30-7'', ''Пробный тариф'', 0.00, 30, 0, ''day'', 8, 0, 0.00, false, 999) RETURNING id, slug, name;")
